title: Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, Putty Matte
descriptions:
Introducing the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick in Putty Matte! Get ready to elevate your eye game with this highly pigmented and long-lasting eyeshadow stick.

The Putty Matte shade is a stunning light taupe-pink that adds a touch of elegance to any look. But that's not all - this eyeshadow stick also comes in a variety of other shades, including Matte, Shimmer, and Metallic, giving you endless options to play with.

The crème-to-powder formula ensures a smooth and seamless application, effortlessly gliding on your eyelids. Plus, it's waterproof and crease-proof, so you can rock your eyeshadow all day without worrying about smudging or fading.

Enriched with beneficial ingredients like Vitamin C, Vitamin E, and Candelilla Wax, this eyeshadow stick not only beautifies but also nourishes your delicate skin. It's suitable for sensitive skin and offers antioxidant protection, helping to improve your skin tone and texture.

No need for extra tools - this eyeshadow stick comes with a built-in smudger, allowing you to easily create a variety of eye looks. The application is a breeze - simply coat the smudger with color, sweep the stick directly onto your eyelids, and use the smudger or your fingers to blend. Don't forget to blend before the formula sets for a flawless finish.

Enhance your eyes with the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, Putty Matte, and embrace the endless possibilities it offers. Get yours now and experience the power of effortless and stunning eye makeup!

With its highly pigmented formula, this eyeshadow stick delivers intense color payoff that will make your eyes pop. The beautiful light taupe-pink shade is perfect for creating both natural and bold looks. 

The Julep Eyeshadow 101 comes in three different finishes - Matte, Shimmer, and Metallic - giving you endless possibilities to express your creativity. 

Not only does this eyeshadow stick provide incredible color, but it also has a crème-to-powder formula that glides on smoothly, allowing for easy application. And the best part? It is completely waterproof and crease-proof, ensuring that your eye makeup stays flawless all day long.

Enriched with the goodness of Vitamin C, Vitamin E, and Candelilla Wax, this eyeshadow stick not only beautifies but also nourishes your delicate skin. It is suitable for those with sensitive skin, providing antioxidant protection and improving skin tone and texture.

No need for any additional tools, as this eyeshadow stick comes with a built-in smudger for effortless blending. Simply sweep the stick directly onto your eyelids, blend using the smudger or your fingers, and enjoy a flawless and long-lasting eye look. Make sure to blend before the formula sets for a seamless finish.

Experience the ultimate convenience and versatility with the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick. Grab yours now and elevate your eye makeup game!
